<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Adamantine Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2797)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk**  varies by armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2915)

</column>

---

Adamantine armor has a shiny, black appearance and is amazingly durable.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Adamantine Armor (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 555 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 1,600 gp (+160 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The initial raw materials must include adamantine worth at least 200 gp + 20 gp per Bulk.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 19"
pfs="Standard"
>
Adamantine Armor (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 555 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 32,000 gp (+3,200 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The initial raw materials must include adamantine worth at least 16,000 gp + 1,600 gp per Bulk.
name: Adamantine Armor (Standard-Grade)
